name: Car-Pass asbl
goal: Car-Pass asbl is the association that, in implementing the Act of 11 June 2004 to curb fraud involving the vehicle mileage, is in charge of recording the mileage of vehicles in Belgium. The not-for-profit organisation has been accredited for this purpose by the Royal Decree of 4 May 2006.
euInitiatives:
fraud with odometers of vehicles
problems faced by consumers when buying a used car
